name: My Ex Sister in Law
description:
Hayato Kijou lost his home and all his belongings in a landslide. Clueless about what to do he called a woman who he never expected to see again. Shouko Yuzuhara is the Ex-Wife of his older brother and the only person he could rely on. She let him stay at her apartment and they slowly get closer...


  • 1920x1080 HD Resolution
  • Original Anime Art
  • Original Soundtrack
  • English Voice Over by DudeThatsLewd
  • 2 different endings
  • Runs on Windows and Linux
  • Can be played with a mouse and only one hand
  • Uncensored
  • Achievements
  • Languages English, Simplified Chinese
  • Very Short (About 30 min)
